string-array.name: msjs_error_webservices
string-array.item: You must enter your username and password.
Email or wrong password, try again.
You must complete all required fields.
Email duplicate, a registered user already exists with this email.
Failed to register the user, try again later.
You must enter your registered email to retrieve your password.
An error occurred while updating your password, try again later.
You must send user data to change.
Unable to modify the user data, try again later.
